description: A process to install the Extended Security Updates (ESU) for Windows Server 2012 R2. This involves first installing the Servicing Stack Update (SSU) defined under KB-5032308, followed by the ESU Licensing Preparation Package (KB-5017220). After ensuring these updates are installed, the Windows Update service must be restarted using the command 'Restart-Service wuauserv -Verbose -PassThru' to apply the updates effectively. Finally, a rescan of Windows Update (WU) or Microsoft Update (MU) is initiated to retrieve the applicable security updates for November 2023. These steps are crucial for maintaining security post the end of extended support.
